video_prompt: Person walks on pier towards the ocean. Gentle waves break on the sandy beach. Clouds drift across the sky. Tree branches sway.
image_prompt: Vibrant, animated-style beachside scene. Left: quaint wooden shop with green/white awning, East Asian sign, "RAGON," potted plants. Right: wooden pier extending into brilliant blue ocean with gentle waves and sandy beach. Clear blue sky with fluffy clouds. Person on pier. Cherry blossom tree frames upper right. Idyllic, anime-like coastal retreat with warm sunlight.
refined_video_prompt: A person progresses along a pier towards the ocean's horizon. Gentle waves ripple and break on the shore. Clouds slowly drift across the sky. Nearby tree branches rhythmically sway.
